summary: REAR DIFFERENTIAL GASKET LEAKS. COULDNT FIX IT WHEN I WENT IN BECAUSE THEY DIDNT HAVE PARTS. REFUSED TO GIVE ME A RENTAL TRUCK. TOLD ME I NEEDED TO PROVE I OWNED A BUSINESS. THEY ALSO WANTED TO KEEP MY VEHICLE BUT I HAVE NO OTHER MEANS TO GET TO WORK. AND THEY DIDNT KNOW HOW LONG IT WAS GOING TO TAKE TO GET THE PARTS. TOLD ME 8 PLUS WEEKS TO GET A GASKET.
